-- | Control.Arrow.Transformer.Cont
--   
--   A library providing Control.Arrow.Transformer.Cont
@package ContArrow
@version 0.0.5

module Control.Arrow.Transformer.Cont
newtype ContArrow e a b c
CO :: (a c e -> a b e) -> ContArrow e a b c
liftCont :: (Arrow a) => a b c -> ContArrow e a b c
runCont :: (ArrowApply a) => ContArrow e a b c -> a c e -> a b e
jump :: (ArrowApply a) => ContArrow e a (a c e, c) z
callcc :: (ArrowApply a) => (a c e -> ContArrow e a b c) -> ContArrow e a b c
instance (ArrowApply a) => ArrowTransformer (ContArrow e) a
instance (ArrowApply a) => ArrowApply (ContArrow e a)
instance (ArrowApply a) => ArrowChoice (ContArrow e a)
instance (ArrowApply a) => Arrow (ContArrow e a)
instance Category (ContArrow e a)
